Html:
I'm using version 2.0.0 in VS2010

I have sucessfuly created the configuration, and I created a <assemblyname>.dll.config  in my project and populated it with my data successfuly using the Intellisense functionality.

However every time I try to access my Config section's by name.Instance, I get a null.

I have read other people with the same issue, but none of their solutions work for me.

My project is a Command Line executable.

I've gotten that error before when the config section was missing from my config file. I've never created a config file based on DLL (only app config), so i wonder if that specific config file is not being read.
